title: BBC Local Live: Cambridgeshire Wednesday, 21 October 2015 - BBC News
summary: a us military pilot has died in an f-18 jet crash in the fens in cambridgeshire .
the plane took off from raf lakenheath this morning .
news , sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: military jet crash and the day 's other news as it happened
text: thanks for joining us today where we 've been following the news of a military jet crash in the fens .
you can catch up with the key points of the story below and see how the day unfolded .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with more live updates .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: plane crash statement from raf lakenheath
text: raf lakenheath has published a message on its facebook page :
`` as always in our darker hours , we 're humbled by everyone 's supportive comments and messages as we 've been responding to the accident .
`` we appreciate your continued thoughts as the response continues . ''

documents.title: fatal military jet crash : round-up of the day 's events
text: if you are just joining us , a us military jet from raf lakenheath crashed earlier today at redmere in the cambridgeshire fens , killing the pilot .
here 's a brief overview of the story so far :
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: impact of plane crash 'heard 10 miles away '
text: glynis kester-page has been in touch : `` we heard and felt the echoes of the impact near barton mills .
how ghastly for the pilot 's family and for his colleagues . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: statement on fatal aircraft crash from west suffolk mp
text: the mp for west suffolk has issued a statement in response to today 's aircraft crash involving a jet that had taken off from raf lakenheath .
those who fly from raf lakenheath serve our country as well as the united states , keeping us safe and free .
there is a tight knit community on the base and our thoughts go out them , and to friends and relatives of the pilot at this difficult time .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: cause of us jet crash at redmere 'unknown ' - us marine corps
text: the marine corps says the cause of the crash is still unknown : `` more information will be released from the 3rd marine aircraft wing public affairs office as it becomes available . ''
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: crashed jet was in transit from bahrain to miramar in california
text: the us marine corps says the f/a-18c hornet was travelling from bahrain to miramar , in california , in a flight of six aircraft when it crashed .
the remaining five f/a-18c 's safely diverted to raf lossiemouth in scotland .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: picture of one of six jets that left lakenheath this morning
text: this is one of the six fighter jets that left raf lakenheath this morning before one of them crashed to the ground in cambridgeshire .
it was photographed just days ago by ade who sent this to us via twitter .

documents.title: 'unknown ' if pilot ejected - us marine corps
text: this statement has just been issued by the us marine corps :
`` united kingdom authorities have officially confirmed the death of the pilot , but it is unknown at this time if the pilot ejected from the single-seat aircraft . ''

documents.title: statement from us marine corps
text: a statement has been issued by marine corps air station miramar , in california :
`` a f/a-18c hornet belonging to marine attack fighter squadron 232 stationed at marine corps air station miramar crashed in the vicinity of royal air force lakenheath . ''
more to follow .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: plane crash latest : 800m police cordon remains in place
text: cambridgeshire police has confirmed an 800m ( 0.5 mile ) cordon will remain in place at the crash site in redmere , near ely .
emergency services will remain on site `` into the evening '' , with the case being passed to the coroner tomorrow .
the case is then expected to be handed over to the us airforce .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: picture : more police and military vehicles arrive at crash site
text: more police and military vehicles have been arriving at the site of the plane crash in redmere .
author: Hannah Olsson
Political reporter, BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: fatal crash plane was flying to california
text: the us air force says the aircraft that crashed at redmere , near ely , was part of a fleet of six fighter jets travelling from bahrain to the base in miramar , california .
the remaining five f/a-18 hornets safely diverted to raf lossiemouth in scotland .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: lakenheath us commander asks for prayers after fatal plane crash
text: col robert g novotny , the commander of the 48th fighter wing , raf lakenheath , has posted a brief update on facebook .
he says : `` please keep the families , the unit and the usmc in your thoughts and prayers as we navigate this tragedy . ''
author: Katy Prickett
BBC News

documents.title: police helicopter circles plane crash site
text: a police helicopter is circling the scene of the us military jet crash near ely , in which a pilot died .
author: Kate Bradbrook
BBC Look East

documents.title: us ambassador offer his condolences
text: matthew barzun , the us ambassador to the uk has tweeted about the crash at redmere , this morning , in which the pilot was killed .
the loss in cambridgeshire today is terrible news , my thoughts & prayers are with all involved .
@ twitterid ambassador please let us know if there 's anything we can do to assist .
we are red devil vets sir .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: aviation enthusiast 'stunned ' by crash
text: i 've been talking to aviation enthusiasts who recently watched and filmed six f18 hornet jets take off from raf lakenheath .
they say the planes lined up in two rows of three and took off one by one .
david tilbury told me : `` a few of us are still in shock here .
we were actually speaking to the pilots at the fence the other day - one of them gave me one of their patches with f18 hornet on it .
i 've got that at home , so i 'm really quite stunned from it all . ''
author: Vikki Irwin
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: listen : witness recalls military plane crash
text: witness karen miles-holdaway , who lives in redmere , has spoken to me about this morning 's military plane crash in the fens .
author: Jeremy Sallis
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: military jet crash : what we know so far
text: here 's a round-up of what we know so far :
author: Jon Welch
BBC News

documents.title: usaf issues statement on jet crash
text: the us air force has issued the following statement :

`` stuttgart , germany ( oct. 21 , 2015 ) - an incident involving a u.s. marine corps f/a-18 hornet , which departed from raf lakenheath , occurred at about 11 a.m. today near littleport , united kingdom .
`` response efforts are under way and the incident is currently under investigation .
more information will be released as it becomes available . ''
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: video : report from plane crash site
text: reporter kate bradbrook has brought us this report from the scene of the military jet crash in cambridgeshire .
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: picture : usaf personnel at the scene in redmere
text: usaf personnel are at the scene of the military plane crash at redmere , near ely .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: video : scene of military plane crash
text: this is what the scene of the plane crash currently looks like , sent in by our reporters on the spot .
author: BBC Look East

documents.title: police at the scene of the crash in redmere
text: this is the scene near the crash at redmere :
author: Kate Bradbrook
BBC Look East

documents.title: skies over fens are very busy
text: the skies above the fens are very busy .
american f15s are based at raf lakenheath and big refuelling tankers are stationed at raf mildenhall .
there are our own tornadoes at raf marham and raf typhoon jets at raf coningsby in lincolnshire .
as well as routine take-offs and landings , jets also fly out over the fens to get to bombing rages in the wash .
author: Ian Barmer
BBC Look East

documents.title: on the spot : more from the plane crash scene
text: details are still incredibly sketchy .
this remote location is just a few miles from the lakenheath and mildenhall air bases .
it 's also close to ely and the suffolk border .
plane spotters have told us that it was one of four planes to have taken off .
we understand the plane was en route to the united states and probably came down shortly after take-off .
author: Kate Bradbrook
BBC Look East

documents.title: witness says jet sound was 'totally different '
text: plane crash witness karen miles-holdaway told bbc radio cambridgeshire : `` as the jets come over you get used to the jets and this was a totally different sound .
`` you could feel the ground move so what i think i heard was probably the impact .
`` my daughter was driving from littleport and she saw this flash of light and plume of smoke . ''
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: crash witness : 'i want to thank pilot 's family '
text: a witness to the us jet crash in redmere , near ely , has said she wants to thank the family of the dead pilot , saying things could have been a lot worse if he had hit nearby homes .
karen miles-holdaway , from shippea hill , said he was a `` great pilot '' .
she described the noise from the crash as `` pretty horrendous '' and said she could feel the ground move .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: witness recalls plane crash in the fens
text: witness karen miles-holdaway told bbc radio cambridgeshire she heard a loud noise from her house and saw the tail end of the plane , but not the crash itself .
`` i was in my garden when the jet flew past and i thought 'oh my god that 's low ' , '' she said .
`` it was pretty horrendous the noise that you heard .
`` after that it 's been chaos , there 's been fire crews and everything going down '' .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: plane crash scene 'a very remote area '
text: it 's a very remote area in the middle of the fens with a few houses surrounded by fields .
there 's a large media presence and two police officers guarding the area .
there is a sign saying police accident '' .
there is a narrow lane leading down to where i believe the crash happened .
nearby there are workers in the fields carrying on with their jobs .
author: Kate Bradbrook
BBC Look East

documents.title: breakingmilitary plane crash - first witness account
text: karen miles-holdaway from redmere has just told bbc radio cambridgeshire she could feel the ground move when the plane crash happened .
more to follow .

documents.title: military crash latest from cambridgeshire police
text: cambridgeshire police has confirmed that emergency services are currently at the scene of a plane crash on farmland in redmere , ely .
the military aircraft that took off from raf lakenheath in suffolk came down at about 10.30am this morning .
the force confirms one fatality and says it believes there was just one person on board the aircraft .
it adds that as and when more information becomes available it shall let people know .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: military plane crash - photo from scene
text: this photo has been taken by our reporters near the scene of the crash at redmere in the cambridgeshire fens .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: f18 is main us navy carrier-based fighter
text: i saw f18 hornets in action just last week at the huge fleet week airshow in san francisco .
the hornet is a us navy jet , and the plane flown by the us navy blue angels display team .

but away from the display circuit , the f18 is the main carrier-based fighter for the navy , and it 's been flying regular bombing missions over the middle east against targets from the so-called islamic state .
author: Ian Barmer
BBC Look East

documents.title: location of plane crash site
text: here 's the location of the plane crash in the cambridgeshire fens , which is a few miles from raf lakenheath .

documents.title: military plane crash : emergency services were called to the scene at 10.30
text: cambridgeshire fire and rescue service has told us they were called to redmere , near ely , at 10:30 .
two crews from ely and littleport were deployed .
police and air ambulance were also at the scene .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: plane crash fatality confirmed
text: ely standard editor john elworthy also confirms news the crash included a fatality .
sadly we have to confirm fatality after jet crash this morning in the fens .
we had held back the information pending confirmation
@ twitterid pilot or civilian ?

documents.title: crashed plane was f/a-18 hornet
text: the plane that crashed near to shippea hill this morning was an f/a-18 hornet , similar to the one .
below .
it 's described as a twin-engine , supersonic , all-weather multi-role jet fighter capable of landing and taking off from an aircraft carrier .
author: Kate Arkell
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: newspaper reports : american f18 crashes in cambridgeshire fens
text: an americanf18 jet has crashed in the cambridgeshire fensthis morning .
author: Newmarket Journal

documents.title: news headlines : us military plane crash in fens near ely
text: news headlines : us military plane crash in fens near ely
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: military plane crash : one confirmed dead
text: cambridgeshire police said one person was on board the jet and there were no other casualties .
the person - believed to the pilot - died at the scene .
the plane is confirmed to have taken off from raf lakenheath .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: plane crash : plane was on its way home to us from middle east
text: amateur aviation enthusiast roger smith says the plane that crashed was one of a group of f/a 18 hornet marine corps planes that were heading back to the us from the middle east .
they arrived at lakenheath over the weekend and four of them took off this morning .
author: Steve Martin
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: breakingmilitary plane crash : police confirm one killed
text: cambridgeshire police has just confirmed one fatality in the military plane crash .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: plane crash : crash in 'isolated area ' , say reports
text: our reporter @ twitterid now at scene of jet crash in the fens .
crash is in an isolated area near to shippea hill .
1st reports of scene soon

documents.title: plane crash : military plane comes down near ely - crash location
text: the area of the fens where the plane crashed is roughly halfway between lakenheath and ely .
emergency services were called to the scene at about 10:30 .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: military plane crash latest
text: a cambridgeshire police spokesman said : `` we are currently at the scene of a plane crash on farmland in redmere , ely .
`` details are sketchy at this stage and it is not known if there are any casualties .
`` as and when more information becomes available we will let you know . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: plane crash : more information should be released within an hour
text: raf mildenhall says while it has no `` releasable '' information at the current time , it hopes to be able to release more information within an hour .
author: Mark Bulstrode
BBC News

documents.title: plane crash : not known if there are casualties
text: it is not yet known whether there are any fatalities after a us f-18 jet crashed near raf lakenheath , reports the press association .
emergency services were sent to the scene near the cambridgeshire/suffolk border .
a cambridgeshire police spokesman said : `` we are currently at the scene of a plane crash on farmland in redmere , ely .
details are sketchy at this stage and it is not known if there are any casualties . ''
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: breakingplane crash : raf lakenheath confirms crashed plane is a us navy jet
text: it 's been confirmed by an raf lakenheath spokesman that the plane that crashed was a us navy jet which had taken off from the suffolk base this morning .
author: BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: plane crash : latest
text: details are still sketchy but we understand a millitary plane has crashed on farmland at redmere near ely .
police , fire and air ambulance were called to the scene just after 10:30 .
no reports yet of any casualties .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: plane crash : edp reports usaf f-18 fighter crashed near shippea hill
text: nigel pickover
nigel pickover
breaking : 999 teams on scene after crash of # usaf f-18 fighter nr to shippea hill station # cambs .
jet came down on farmland .
more @ twitterid
breaking : 999 teams on scene after crash of # usaf f-18 fighter nr to shippea hill station # cambs .
jet came down on farmland .
more @ twitterid

documents.title: more details emerging on plane crash on farmland at redmere near ely
text: breaking only information i have on jet crash is emergency services on way. , scene of crash is place called red mere near shippea hill
@ twitterid - small ( pedantic ) correction : i believe it is redmere , not red mere .

documents.title: breakinga plane has crashed into farmland near ely
text: emergency services are currently at the scene of a plane crash on farmland near ely .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: breakingreports coming in of a military jet crash in the fens
text: breaking reports of military jet crash at shippea hill in the fens

documents.title: addenbrooke 's bosses meet for first time since hospital put in special measures
text: i 'll be at the board of directors meeting at addenbrooke 's hospital today .
it 's the first meeting since it was placed in special measures following a damning care quality commission report .
last month also saw the resignation of chief executive dr keith mcneil and chief finance officer paul james .
i 'll provide updates throughout the day .
author: Jozef Hall
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: trial begins of local alternative to ebay
text: residents near ely are being given the chance to donate their unwanted items and buy second hand goods via a new website from the county council and waste company amey .
called revive , the pilot is taking place at witchford recycling centre and aims to cut waste .
if successful , the project will be rolled out to other centres .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: sound could be used to help detect cancers
text: sound is being used to help detect cancers instantly .
the research carried out by cambridge-based anglia ruskin scientist dr domenico vicinanza is being showcased at the european commission 's ict conference in lisbon today .
it works by using data sonification - where data is conveyed as audio signals as opposed to visual illustrations such as graphs - to speed up analysis of biopsies .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: arrest following armed siege at house in peterborough
text: a 31-year-old man from peterborough has been arrested following an armed siege in the city yesterday .
officers were called to a house on watergall , bretton , at just after 12:30 following reports of a domestic incident .
police said a man entered a house and refused to come out .
a woman , also inside , was uninjured .
author: Katharine Park
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: in royal anglians march through st neots
text: new released by the army show the homecoming parade by members of the royal anglian regiment in st neots yesterday .
more than 200 soldiers from the 1st battalion the royal anglian regiment were cheered by well-wishers , as they exercised their freedom of the cambridgeshire town for the first time .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: reports of man arrested after house incident
text: the peterborough telegraph is reporting that a man has been arrested following a five hour long armed siege at a house in bretton yesterday .
police were called to the home on watergall shortly after midday .
as soon as we get confirmation from police we will let you know .
author: Alex Pope
BBC Local Live

documents.title: conservative mp heidi allen calls on ministers to rethink cuts to tax credits
text: south cambridgeshire 's conservative mp heidi allen has used her maiden speech in parliament to call on her party to rethink its position on cuts to tax credits .
she told the commons : a country and economy does not function if the people who run the engine can not afford to run it the pace of tax credit reforms is too hard and too fast . ''
author: Hanna Holsson
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: news headlines : south cambs mp heidi allen calls for tax credit rethink
text: here are the top stories from cambridgeshire this morning :
author: Kerry Devine
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: weather : a wet start to the day , top temperature 14c ( 57f )
text: it will be a cloudy morning with outbreaks of rain , some of which could be heavy .
top temperature 14c ( 57f ) .
for a more detailed forecast for where you live , head to bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning and welcome to cambridgeshire live for wednesday
text: hello and welcome to cambridgeshire live , where we 'll bring you live news , sport , travel and weather updates until 18:00 .
you can send us your stories , and comments at any time via email , facebook or twitter .
the news and a weather update for this wet wednesday morning coming up shortly .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live
